description:
Oh, so you’re great?

Then…

Are you a connoisseur of cultural relics?

Or are you a miracle-creating doctor?

Whatever you are, it doesn’t matter. Even if you are a cow, I can turn you into my faithful s*ave! Also, your special skills are mine!>
